author: Special Correspondent
text:
The special camp for fertility treatment was initiated at the Corporation Maternity Hospital along Gandhiji Road by District Collector S. Prabakar on Sunday.

Nine camps will be conducted till February 29 in all the maternity hospitals involving participaton of gyanacologists and pediatricians, according to Corporation sources.

The patients will be tested for blood sugar, diabetes and haemoglobin level at the camp where registration for maternity benefit under Dr. Muthulakshmi Reddy scheme will also be undertaken. Ultrasound scan will also be taken. A medial team from IRT Medical College Perundurai, and others from private hospitals will visit the hospitals once in 15 days for sustaining treatment, and carrying out laprascopy procedures.

Deepa Blood Testing Lab has come forward to carry out sperm motility test free of cost, and Rainbow Scan centre has also offered its services. Mayor Malliga Paramasivam and Deputy Mayor K.C. Palanichamy also took part.
title: Special camp for infertility treatment
